description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate Dipped Cherries recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chocolate-covered fruit,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,High fibre,Christmas,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Chocolate
name: Chocolate Dipped Cherries Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line a baking tray with baking paper.

Break milk chocolate into pieces. Place into a heat-proof bowl. Sit bowl onto a saucepan of simmering water, ensuring that the water doesn't touch the bottom of the bowl. Stir with a metal spoon until melted and smooth.

Holding cherries by the stalk, dip into warm chocolate and let excess drip off. Place onto tray and refrigerate until set. Pile onto a large plate. Note: Melt chocolate over simmering water and keep stirring to avoid it burning.
